nodes.label: start_refund
utterances: I'm sorry to hear you'd like to request a refund for your canceled subscription. Could you please provide your account number?

nodes.label: ask_reason
utterances: Thank you. Could you please tell me the reason for your refund request?

nodes.label: confirmation_refund
utterances: I understand. I've processed your refund. You should see it in your account within 5-7 business days. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

nodes.label: modify_account_number
utterances: Of course! Could you please provide your updated account number?

nodes.label: ask_reason_after_update
utterances: Thank you. Could you please tell me the reason for your refund request?

nodes.label: exit_conversation
utterances: I understand. If you need any further assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

nodes.label: alternative_refund_path
utterances: We can also offer a store credit instead of a refund. Would you prefer that?

nodes.label: confirmation_store_credit
utterances: Understood. I've issued a store credit to your account. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

nodes.label: modify_reason
utterances: Certainly. Could you please provide the new reason for your refund request?
